paper_abstract: The optimal deterministic strategy for the on-line leasing of depreciable equipment is presented here for cases with and without an interest rate. A risk-reward model in which the on-line investor can develop optimal strategies based on his/her risk tolerance and forecast is discussed. Numerical analysis shows that the competitive performance is significantly improved in the proposed model. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A risk-reward model for the on-line leasing of depreciable equipment
